thread.title: Sergio Aguero to Real Madrid: Manchester City striker eyes big-money return to Spanish capital after Gabriel Jesus nicked his spot
thread.title_full: Sergio Aguero to Real Madrid: Manchester City striker eyes big-money return to Spanish capital after Gabriel Jesus nicked his spot

author: jgordon
title: Sergio Aguero to Real Madrid: Manchester City striker eyes big-money return to Spanish capital after Gabriel Jesus nicked his spot
text:
Sergio Aguero wants a Real Madrid move after falling down the pecking order 
But it will take over £60million before City even consider selling Aguero to a Champions League rival. Keep up to date with ALL the Manchester City news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
Spanish giants Real are still keen on having the Argentine ace spearhead their attack next season. 
Aguero, 28, played for Real’s bitter rivals Atletico Madrid before he moved to Manchester in 2011. Related Stories La La Land Yaya Toure claims frustrated Sergio Aguero should know why Pep Guardiola goes crazy at him on sidelines REAL DEALS Isco and Karim Benzema out, Sergio Aguero and Thibaut Courtois in... How Real Madrid's summer transfer business is shaping up LUIZ IS STILL IN KNEE-D David Luiz needs treatment for rest of season following Sergio Aguero horror tackle in November FIVE THINGS WE LEARNT Sergio Aguero is back, Leroy Sane is City's best player, and Falcao must've just hated English football PEN APPEAL Steven Gerrard and Rio Ferdinand stunned Man City were not given a penalty for foul on Sergio Aguero Team news Manchester City vs Monaco team news: Vincent Kompany OUT, Pep Guardiola still to decide Claudio Bravo or Willy Caballero 
The striker scored a cracker against French side Monaco in City’s 5-3 Champions League win on Tuesday — one of two goals on the night. 
But he is only in the side because Jesus is out for two months nursing a fractured metatarsal. PA:Press Association Gabriel Jesus was Pep Guardiola’s preferred striker before he went down injured Reuters 4 Aguero had been forced to play a role off the bench 
Aguero has no intention of spending more time on the Etihad bench — and wants the Real move to happen this summer. 
Although Aguero has held talks with City chief Pep Guardiola about his future, the Catalan coach refused to assure him of a first-choice role. Manchester City legend Sergio Aguero comes on as a substitute and does his bit AP:Associated Press
